Description:
Manages the requests for loan hardware, including the recall of loaned items, ensuring that the hardware items are tracked and managed.
Identifies areas of process improvement and communicates to the line manager.
Provides status reports and dashboard reporting.
Develops written plans, policies, and procedures to document processes to support the asset management lifecycle. 
Maintain the asset database accurately and up to date.
Point of contact for Fixed Asset Management Team (FAM)
Maintain working relationships with internal stakeholders (Network Team, Infosec, Computer Infrastructure, etc.) and external stakeholders (Finance, Warehouse).
Perform other duties as assigned related to the IT asset life cycle.Skills
Skills:
SAP Knowledge
Ability to interact positively and effectively with colleagues at all levels within the IT function, as well as with all customers.
Knowledge of office automation, Information Technology techniques and practices, forms and records management
Ability to work well with people from different disciplines with varying degrees of technical experience
Knowledge of office automation, Information Technology techniques and practices, forms and records management
Good oral and writing skills
